properties.label: URI
properties.description: URI should contain username, password, host name, port number, and virtual host

pattern.message: Must start with amqp(s):// or contain a secret reference

properties.label: Exchange
properties.description: Topic exchange: get from RabbitMQ external application configurations. Details in the documentation

properties.label: Routing key
properties.description: Routing key: a binding is a "link" that was set up to bind a queue to an exchange. Details in the documentation

properties.label: Virtual host
properties.description: Virtual name: get from RabbitMQ external application configurations. Details in the documentation

properties.label: Host name
properties.description: Host name: get from RabbitMQ external application configurations. Details in the documentation

properties.label: Port
properties.description: Port: get from RabbitMQ external application configurations. Details in the documentation

properties.label: Properties
properties.description: Properties for the message, routing headers, etc

properties.label: Message
properties.description: Data to send to RabbitMQ

properties.label: Version
properties.description: Version of the element template

properties.label: ID
properties.description: ID of the element template

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: Name of variable to store the response in

properties.label: Result expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables

properties.label: Error expression
properties.description: Expression to handle errors. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Retries
properties.description: Number of retries

properties.label: Retry backoff
properties.description: ISO-8601 duration to wait between retries
